resources.string: Complete the action on your TREZOR device
App needs permission to access TREZOR
Error while communicating with TREZOR device
Using PIN protection is highly recommended. PIN prevents unauthorized persons from stealing your bitcoins even when they get physical access to your device.
Allows you to access new wallets, each hidden behind a particular passphrase. Your old accounts will be accessible behind an empty passphrase
If you disable the passphrase encryption, your current funds will not appear. You will have to enable the passphrase encryption again to see your current wallet
Forgetting only removes the device from this app, your bitcoins are still safe and you can access them by reconnecting your TREZOR again
Do you want to forget your device?\n\nForgetting only removes the device from the list on the left, your bitcoins are still safe and you can access them by reconnecting your TREZOR again
Wiping the device removes all its information\nUse this feature only if you have your Recovery Seed or you don\'t have any coins on your device
All data on your device will be deleted\n\nThis action cannot be undone. Never do this action with TREZOR holding coins unless you have your recovery seed at hand
Disconnect your TREZOR now to apply changed settings
Your TREZOR is not backed up\nTap to create backup
Your TREZOR has a generic name\nTap to name your TREZOR to increase security
Your TREZOR is not protected by a PIN\nTap to create PIN
New to TREZOR? Don\'t worry!\nWe will walk you through the setup process\nin a few minutes.
Have you used a TREZOR before?\nOwn a recovery seed from a different wallet or app?\nSimply restore the wallet from your backup.
First you need to create a backup of your TREZOR to protect your coins from the unexpected
Your recovery seed is the backup key to all your cryptocurrencies and applications

Your recovery seed can only be displayed once. Never make a digital copy of your recovery seed and never upload it online. Keep your recovery seed in a safe place. TREZOR cannot be held liable for financial losses incurred through improper care of sensitive information.

- Do not take a photo of your recovery seed
- Do not write it into a computer
- Do not save it into your cloud storage
- Never upload it on the Internet

On your TREZOR, you will now see a unique combination of 24 words, which will allow you to recover your accounts in case you lose your device. The order of the words is very important.\n\nPlease write down all these words carefully.
Your TREZOR device will now display your 24 word recovery seed again.\nThese words serve as your backup in case you lose the device.
word from TREZOR\ninto the recovery seed card
You have successfully backed up your device!

Your TREZOR Model T will now display your 12-word recovery seed. Swipe to scroll through the words.\n\nAfter you confirm you finished writing down the words, TREZOR will randomly select two words and ask you to retype them on the screen for verification.
Why should you name your device?
By customizing the device name, you can be sure that the TREZOR in your hands is indeed yours. It may also help you in distinguishing between different TREZOR devices.
Choose a name for your TREZOR
Personalize your device with your own name or choose one from the examples.\nMaximum label length is 16 characters.
Choose a strong PIN to protect your device from unauthorized access.\nThe layout will be displayed on your TREZOR
Good job! Your PIN is set
Look at the device for number positions
Note that the positions of numbers shown on the device have changed!
Be careful with your XPUBs. When you give them to a third party, you allow it to see your whole transaction history. Learn more
For best results pick a 124x64 black and white image (not grayscale)
For best results pick a 144x144 image
or, select image from a list:
Number of words in you recovery seed

Your wallet backup, the recovery seed, is entered entirely on the TREZOR Model T, through the device screen. We avoid passing any of your sensitive information to a potentially insecure computer or web browser. 

First of all, TREZOR will ask you how long is your recovery seed. Select the correct number and then you will be asked to enter the words in their correct order, as displayed on the screen. Us the touchscreen to enter the words. 

Click on "Continue" to start the recovery process.

Please follow the instructions on your device.
Words are going to be entered in shuffled order

Seed words entered so far:
Firmware upgrade available\nTap to show details
Your TREZOR firmware is up to date
It is time to install the device firmware
For full functionality and security, we recommend you keep your TREZOR updated\nFor more information about the update process, please visit the user manual
This is a required update, you must update your TREZOR before you continue\nFor more information about the update process, please visit the user manual

Your TREZOR is shipped without firmware installed to ensure that you can get started with the latest features right away

The authenticity of the installed firmware is always checked during device start
If the firmware is not correctly signed by SatoshiLabs, your TREZOR will display a warning
1. Disconnect TREZOR\n2. When connecting, hold both buttons pressed
1. Disconnect TREZOR\n2. When connecting, slide your fingers on the display\n3. Confirm connection in bootloader mode on device
Uploading firmware…\nIf asked, please confirm the action on your device
Wiping device…\nIf asked, please confirm the action on your device
Make sure the same fingerprint is displayed on the device screen
Update was successful\nComplete the action on your TREZOR device
Firmware install was successful\nComplete the action on your TREZOR device
Factory reset was successful\nComplete the action on your TREZOR device
Update failed!\nPlease unplug the device now
Firmware install failed!\nPlease unplug the device now
Factory reset failed!\nPlease unplug the device now

Your TREZOR may have already been set up. We cannot check the state of your device because it is in bootloader mode.\nIf your device has already been initialized, meaning you have a recovery seed, make sure you have it with you.
Your TREZOR is already set up. Before you update firmware, please make sure that you have recovery seed with you.
I have recovery seed with me
You can reset the TREZOR Model T to factory defaults if you need to do so
Please keep in mind that factory reset will erase all sensitive data, including the seed from the device, as well as the firmware
All data on your device will be deleted\n\nThis action cannot be undone. Never do this action with TREZOR holding coins unless you have your recovery seed at hand
